Instruction: Chill dough thoroughly in the fridge before rolling it out for the best results.
Shape the dough into cookies and arrange them on a baking sheet about an inch apart.
Bake in the preheated oven for about 10 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool the cookies on wire racks.

Stir the brown sugar into the melted butter, allowing it to dissolve for a couple of minutes on the stovetop. Next, add the cream, salt, and marshmallows to the mixture, stirring until completely melted and smooth.
